Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   838	@app.route('/api/feeds/<int:feed_id>', methods=['PUT'])
   839	def update_feed_url(feed_id):
   840	    """Updates a feed's URL and name."""
   841	    # Find feed or return 404
   842	    feed = db.get_or_404(Feed, feed_id)
   843	    
   844	    data = request.get_json()
   845	    # Validate input
   846	    if not data or 'url' not in data or not data['url'].strip():
   847	        return jsonify({'error': 'Missing feed URL'}), 400
   848	    
   849	    new_url = data['url'].strip()
   850	    
   851	    # Check if the new URL is already used by another feed
   852	    existing_feed = Feed.query.filter(Feed.id != feed_id, Feed.url == new_url).first()
   853	    if existing_feed:
   854	        return jsonify({'error': f'Feed with URL {new_url} already exists'}), 409 # Conflict
   855	    
   856	    try:
   857	        # Attempt to fetch the feed to get its title
   858	        parsed_feed = fetch_feed(new_url)
   859	        if not parsed_feed or not parsed_feed.feed:
   860	            # If fetch fails, use the URL as the name
   861	            new_name = new_url
   862	            new_site_link = None
   863	            logger.warning(f"Could not fetch title for {new_url}, using URL as name.")
   864	        else:
   865	            new_name = parsed_feed.feed.get('title', new_url) # Use URL as fallback if title missing
   866	            new_site_link = parsed_feed.feed.get('link') # Get the website link
   867	        
   868	        # Update the feed
   869	        original_url = feed.url
   870	        feed.url = new_url
   871	        feed.name = new_name
   872	        feed.site_link = new_site_link
   873	        feed.last_updated_time = datetime.datetime.now(datetime.timezone.utc)
   874	        
   875	        db.session.commit()
   876	        
   877	        # Trigger update to fetch new items
   878	        try:
   879	            success, new_items = fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
   880	            if success and new_items > 0:
   881	                invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
   882	                logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
   883	        except Exception as update_e:
   884	            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation
   885	            logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed.id} after URL change: {update_e}", exc_info=True)
   886	        
   887	        logger.info(f"Updated feed {feed_id} from '{original_url}' to '{new_url}'.")
   888	        return jsonify(feed.to_dict()), 200 # OK
   889	        
   890	    except Exception as e:
   891	        db.session.rollback()
   892	        logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed_id}: {str(e)}", exc_info=True)
   893	        raise e # Let 500 handler manage response
   894	
   895	# --- Feed Items API Endpoints ---
   896	
   897	@app.route('/api/items/<int:item_id>/read', methods=['POST'])
   898	def mark_item_read(item_id):
   899	    """Marks a specific feed item as read."""
   900	    # Find item or return 404
